actions.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to extend the authorization of the Commission on Interstate Child Support and the deadline for the Commission's Report to Congress.

summary.text: Amends the Family Support Act of 1988 to extend from May 1992 until August 1992 the deadline for the report to the Congress of the Commission on Interstate Child Support on improved interstate establishment and enforcement of child support awards and on revising the Uniform Reciprocal Enforcement of Support Act. Postpones from July 1 to September 30, 1992, the Commission's termination date.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization of the Commission on Interstate Child Support and the deadline for the Commission's Report to Congress.
